Name: Form.Radio
Desc: Radio component using only HTML elements with val, selected, disable, select methods
LongDesc: The Radio component provides a group of radio buttons using only div elements. It supports selecting, disabling, and retrieving the selected value. Useful for single-choice options in forms.
Example: var rg = Q.Form.Radio([{value:'a',text:'A'}]); rg.change((i,v,t)=>{}); rg.disable(0); rg.select(0);
